member.name: T:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent
member.summary: Class to hold information about Vertex and Edges on the SweepLine algorithm. SweepEvents are compared by X, then Y coordinates of the vertex. If same vertex, Pairs are compared insted.

member.name: P:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.IsLeft
member.summary: Determines if SweepEvent comes first on a left to right direction

member.name: P:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.IsInside
member.summary: Flags if associated edge is inside other polygon on boolean operations

member.name: P:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.InOut
member.summary: Flags if the associated edge represents an in-out transition into the polygon in an upwards, y-axis direction.

member.name: F:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.Label
member.summary: Label to define how a SweepEvent contributes to a polygon boolean operation.

member.name: M:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.UpdatePairVertex(Graphical.Geometry.gVertex)
member.summary: Updates the edge and Pair event with a new gVertex

member.name: M:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.CompareTo(Graphical.Core.SweepEvent)
member.summary: SweepEvent comparer. A SweepEvent is considered less than other if having smaller X, then Y and then Z.

member.name: M:Graphical.Core.SweepEvent.Equals(Graphical.Core.SweepEvent)
member.summary: SweepEvent equality comparer. SweepEvents are considered equals if have the same edge.

member.name: T:Graphical.Core.SortEventsVerticalAscendingComparer
member.summary: Custom Vertical Ascending IComparer for SweepEvent. Lower SweepEvent has lowest X. At same X, lowest Y and finally lowest Z.

member.name: T:Graphical.Core.SweepLine
member.summary: Helper class to implement Bentley-Ottmann Algorithm for polygon self-intersections and boolean operations.

member.summary: Returns the event below SweepEvent on index, null if none

member.summary: Returns the event above SweepEvent on index, null if none
